publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2040 Patricia Ferguson: Congratulations to St Joan of Arc School, Glasgow—That the Parliament notes with pleasure the first prize award made to St Joan of Arc school, Glasgow, in this year’s Scotland’s Finest Woods Schools’ Awards; applauds the establishment of the school’s own garden and willow nursery and the contribution made to the community garden at Lambhill Stables; further notes that the awards are designed to encourage and reward schools that help young people to understand and appreciate the benefits of woodlands, and congratulates the Forest Education Initiative, the Royal Scottish Forestry Society and Forestry Commission Scotland on their support.
